DOC.brief_summary: This study will describe the impact of vaccination with ZOSTAVAX™ on the epidemiology of herpes zoster (HZ) in a cohort of vaccinated participants 50 years or age or older, compared to a cohort of unvaccinated participants.
DOC.brief_title: ZOSTAVAX™ (Zoster Vaccine Live) Long-term Effectiveness Study (V211-024)
DOC.criteria: Participants with continuous Kaiser Permanente Northern California (KPNC) membership since becoming ageeligible for ZOSTAVAX™ and with 12 months of continuous enrollment in KPNC before their study start date
